name: Stack Maze Puzzle
description:
Stack Maze Puzzle is a very interesting maze and platform game in which you have to observe the path and select the most appropriate route to collect all the possible blocks that will allow you to reach the finish line safely.

Get ready to run through a maze full of uncharted paths and slide to the exit door in the blink of an eye! As the game progresses the levels will change and the difficulty will grow testing your intelligence and endurance once again. Have a good time!
